model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
When is your first music concert this summer?
I went to a concert on the fourth of July. It was great. What sort of art museum are you going to?
The museum has all sorts of galleries.  It has a sculpture garden outside.  I mostly like the impressionist paintings.  I like Van Gogh.  Was your concert outdoors?
Yes. That way they could have a fireworks show too. I love fireworks. Have you ever seen the fireworks at the Disney castle?
No, but I have been to Disney World in Florida.  I love fireworks too.  I want to get married on the 4th of July.  That was we will have a national holiday and fireworks for us every year!  It sounds like you've been to Disneyland?
No, but I thought you might have since you lived in LA for awhile. Did you get to see any live Disney music performances while you were at Disney World?
No, we rode a lot of rides that broke down.  We had to be rescued from the Pirates of the Caribbean ride.  It was stuck.  Someone put on waders and pushed us to the side to climb out.
Oh no! Hopefully your trip to the art museum is much better than that. Did your boyfriend go to Disney World too?
No, I had a cousin that I went with.  We stayed in a hotel in Miami too and I got so sunburned on the beach!  I'm sure the art museum will be good if it isn't too crowded.  Was your concert crowded?
It was so crowded, but my older brothers went with me and kept me from getting squished. Make sure you wear sunscreen when you visit the beach this time!

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Music Taste and Concert Experiences', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B discuss favorite music genres, live music preferences, and experiences attending concerts.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: Wow, I've never had that.  Is it chewy? ### Speaker A: What kind of music do you most like hearing live? ### Speaker B: Rock or metal. I am a huge fan! I cannot get enough of it.  ### Speaker A: Thats awesome to hear. You mentioned you like Three Dog Night the most, have you seen them in concert yet? How are they live? ### Speaker B: I've seen them once, but would love to again. Their live show is so good. I am always impressed with them. ### Speaker A: Sounds like a good concert to go to. What would you say is your favorite song from them, I think I might give them a listen later on. ### Speaker B: I really enjoy 'Mama Told Me', one of their lesser known songs, but I really like it. Sometimes those are the best songs.' }
```
